entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
